comments.content:
Seeing a new timeout that is causing tempest to fail.

'Timed out waiting for a reply to message XYZ' during the DeleteServersTest test.

http://logs.openstack.org/68/121968/2/check/check-tempest-dsvm-full/8f3790e/logs/screen-n-api.txt.gz#_2014-09-23_02_24_06_195

comments.content:
We definitely have some generic timeouts here happening. Typically this is related to another lock being held long enough that it blocks the rpc request.

Can you dig in deeper about that?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
